name: Pretty Black Google with simple colors
description:
Google with a black background an white/colored text.
Includes some Google sites and will be updated in the future to support even more features.
Simply small and fast.
additional_info:
Pretty Black Google with simple colors - Version 1.4
Includes:
  • Google Home
  • Google Search
  • Google Image Search
  • Google Translator
  • Google Services Login
  • Google+ popups
  • Blocks ads
  • More things in the future!

    Changes:
  • Some little changes

    Features:
  • Black background for various google sites
  • White color for texts
  • Important information/links are colored special

    EN:
    This style gives Google a black background, the text is white and left / Important information are inked. If you have any questions / found a bug / feedback, please start a new discussion or write me a private message!

    DE:
    Dieses Style gibt Google einen schwarzen Hintergrund, der Text ist weiß und Links/Wichtige Informationen sind eingefärbt. Wenn du Fragen/einen Bug gefunden/Feedback hast, starte einen neue Diskussion oder schreibe mir eine private Nachricht!

    Have fun!



    Tags: black google, dark google, white text, white black google

discussions.name: Looks good - How about Google Voice?
